channel.title: Bounty Hunter icon dissapearing need help
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/4seagy.png[/img] Then i running and got message in the middle screen Loading Screen, its sometimes show up bounty hunter icon for one second, how to fix it? sorry for bad english. I think its becose other icon wanna show up and they both bugs
i used this tutorial: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/448327-real-bounty-hunter-worlds-release-9.html
btw my client from sunnyscape

item.title: Bounty Hunter icon dissapearing need help
item.dc:creator: @adrijusxx adrijusxx
item.description:
@adrijusxx wrote:

Lock thread managed by my self
How:
Server sided client.java

find this

if (inWild()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); getPA().walkableInterface(197);

and remove last line:

and you’re done

Read full topic
item.source: Bounty Hunter icon dissapearing need help

item.title: Bounty Hunter icon dissapearing need help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

One reason I could see this being an issue is if both your bounty hunter icons and your wildy icons are walkable interfaces.

The client only supports showing 1 walkable interface at a time. So if you have 2 of them being used… The last one used will be shown.

A solution for this would be to a) modify the client to allow 2 walkable interfaces. or b) modify the client to allow specifically those 2 interfaces at the same time. or c) Learn how to use configs server sided, and then modify the client to read your custom configs to show the bounty hunter interface.

Read full topic
item.source: Bounty Hunter icon dissapearing need help
